command.exec: cd /home/ubuntu/chef-repo; knife bootstrap ${option.Host_IP} -N ${option.Host_Name} -x ${option.User_Name} -P intel123 --run_list 'recipe[ufw::user]' --sudo --no-host-key-verify; knife tag create ${option.Host_Name} ${option.Rundeck_Tags} ; knife tag create ${option.Host_Name} ${option.Host_IP}
cd /home/ubuntu/chef-repo; knife ssh name:${option.Host_Name} -x ${option.User_Name} -P intel123 "sudo sed -i 's/ubuntu-test-system/${option.Host_Name}/g' /etc/hostname"
